name: Fury Of The Gods
description: Wield the power of a god in your fingertips.Your once faithful followers have revolted against you by renouncing their faith and tearing down your temples. Unleash your wrath with the Almighty Finger and smite those heathens down!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win Vista/7/8 Processor: 1.5 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GT 630, Radeon HD3870 or better Storage: 360 MB available space

reviews.review_text: It's okay for a short game but I want shortcuts, not click and drag, a pause button so I can put my defenders properly and a halo showing how my defenders' reach. It is also difficult to grind for coins for upgrades imo
